org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowBitmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowBitmap

  • @Implements(value=android.graphics.Bitmap.class)
public class ShadowBitmap
extends Object
    Shadow for Bitmap.

        @Implementation
public void getPixels(int[] pixels,
                            int offset,
                            int stride,
                            int x,
                            int y,
                            int width,
                            int height)
        Note that this method will return a RuntimeException unless: - pixels has the same length as the number of pixels of the bitmap. - x = 0 - y = 0 - width and height height match the current bitmap's dimensions.
